name: Izzy's rotten world
description:
This is a FNAF fan game and is only a prototype  more is to come so DON'T DISS IT

1.No jumpscares have been added yet. (maybe in the next update)

2.No animation are added yet. (maybe in the next update)

3.You have to "survive" for as long as possible. (death is going to be added in the next update)
